Spatial weights matrix

wmat.Rd

Spatial weights matrix class / constructor

wmat(w, geom)

Arguments

w

foo
geom

foo

Examples

data("est_adm1")
w <- w_contiguity(sf::st_geometry(est_adm1))
w
